decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the To0wn and Country PLanning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995, Schedule 2, Part 25 as amended (or any order revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification), no microwave antenna, satellite antenna, or any structure intended for the support of such an antenna or antennas shall be erected.

Condition : 3 - Before the use hereby permitted shall not commence until a scheme indicating the provision to be made for disabled people to gain access to, make emergency egress from and make full use of thel licensed bookmakers shall have been implemented in accordance with details submitted to an approved in writing by the local planning authority.

Condition : 4 - The use hereby permitted shall not commence until a shop window display shall have been implemented in accordance with details submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority, and such window display shall be permanently retained.
description: Change of use from Hairdressers (A1) to Licensed Bookmakers (A2) including internal alterations
